issue.title: [CF 1627] Azerite traits
issue.body:
Anyway to track battlefield focus? Tried a bit but cant seem to get it to work? 


> Posted by CurseForge user fogelberg27 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1627 | Raw

comments.body:
Buff/Debuff aura

Track 'Battlefield Focus'

Check debuff

Check 'only cast by me', unless you want to see anybody's stacks


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

Found it but forgot to update! Thanks bud 

Edited Dec 14, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user fogelberg27
